subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Paula Creamer made two long birdie putts to pull away from the field at the SemGroup Championship in Broken Arrow, Okla., only to drop two shots on the closing holes for the third straight day to give her challengers a chance. A three-putt on the 16th and a bogey from the bunker on the 18th gave Creamer a two-under-par 69, good enough for a two-shot lead over Juli Inkster.
